content: Blue Cross NC and Amerigroup may terminate any User's right to use this site at any time. Blue Cross NC and Amerigroup reserve the right to block, delete or stop the uploading of materials and communications that it in its sole discretion finds unacceptable for any reason. Your right to use this site will end at the close of your Membership in the Healthy Blue plan. If your right to use this site ends, you shall make no further use of this site or any information obtained from this site.
